document_title: Cholecystitis: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_name: viem-tui-mat.json_1_Who is at risk of cholecystitis?
subsection_content:
Below are people in the high-risk group for cholecystitis:
Women over 50 years old; Men over 60 years old; Overweight.; Diabetes.; Pregnant; Have Crohn's disease.; Have end-stage kidney disease; Have heart disease.; Hyperlipidemia.; Have sickle cell disease.; People whose diet is high in fat and cholesterol.
